The area you are in is so small that you are touching a part of the bird on all sides. Soon after arriving you feel the walls start to secrete digestive juices all around you. You are then massaged with them for a small amount of time. Directly after this you are pushed downward again. You fall into the gizzard and it instantly goes to work on you. The sack you are in begins to churn violently and you are thrown around the fleshy sack with ease. After the gizzard knows its contents are covered throughly, it contracts and begins to grind on you. It doesn't feel like much is happening. After this the gizzard begins to collapse and contract smashing you repeatedly. The gizzard then relaxes to full capacity and you have time to breathe. Outside, the turkey had a stomach ache, and it knew what would do the trick, it began swallowing stones. Soon after, these very stones enter the gizzard, and you know why. It would grind on you with these stones until you were a pulp of nutrients. Within moments the gizzard began contracting and you attempt to fight it, but to no avail. The stones push against you just as the gizzard begins to grind around you. Instantly bones break, and you pass out from pain. You are then slowly digested into nutrients for the bird.
15431221.title: Going down.

15432.content: You take off like a dart into the grass, you attempt to wade through it but it is too thick at some parts. You dive through a thick patch, what happens?
15432.title: Run into the Field

154322.content: You make it through the grass, falling into a dirt section. You see a large group of ants, luckily at your size they are like dogs to you and don't even seem to notice you.
154322.title: You make it through

15433.content: Before you even have much of a reaction, the bird was swooping directly for you. You attempted to run, but before you know it you were snatched up by the birds claws. It directly flies to a nearby tree top.
15433.title: Too late, You had no chance

154331.content: As soon as it stops you attempt to free yourself, but you make no progress before the bird leans down and puts you in it's beak. You are suspended, held by the beak for only a moment. The bird jolts it's head and tosses you into the beak. Its tongue assists you on your trip toward the throat, and as you slide backward the bird tilts it's head backward to help swallow. It gulps once bringing you into your waist, your tiny legs still visible to the outside world. But, one more gulp gives the throat muscles control and you are slowly bobbed deeper into the bird. After a few moments you slide into a sack like area. You know this to be the crop of the bird, where it stores it's food before digestion. This means you are nothing more than a meal waiting for final processing.This area is completely empty and you can feel the small movements of the bird. Without warning you are thrown to the back of the crop as the bird takes flight. You are tossed about in the crop for awhile before the bird lands and lays down. You know whats coming next. Because the crop was so empty, you know you are next in line for the processing chamber, the gizzard. The gizzard has two parts, one that secretes digestive juices and rubs it over food before sending it to the next chamber where it is mechanistically grounded down.
154331.title: Better luck next time

choices: The bird swallows rocks to get rid of you.
1543311.content: Unexpectedly, area a few feet on the other side of the crop opens. Before you can wonder why nothing else was happening, the area behind you shoves you directly into the open area you are shoved and slid for about 20 feet in the bird before you feel the area you are being shoved into get extremely tight until the area itself is required to stretch to fit you. After you arrive you cannot move whatsoever. But, before long you can feel the area around you getting damp and as soon as you notice this, the walls begin grinding back and fourth covering your entire body with digestive enzymes. As soon as you're well soaked and marinated in the digestive juices, the walls release and you fall and slide another 20 feet into the real gizzard. As soon as you enter, the birds fast metabolism goes to work on processing you. The walls slosh digestive juices around you like a agitator in a washing machine. The walls then contract and begin to grind and squeeze you they release, let you fall, then contract smashing, sloshing, and grinding you in every possible direction.
1543311.title: Grinding Gizzard

155.content: You walk up to the back door of the house, and see that there is enough room under the door for you to climb under. You squeeze through and walk inside. You are in the kitchen, where should you go.
155.title: Head to a near-by house

15521.content: As you finish climbing the pile of junk you are hit by a strong breeze, a gale force wind by your size. You are carried a short distance before you hit something liquid. You surface the liquid to see you landed directly in the pitcher of luke-warm iced tea. Before you can get your footing you feel the pitcher lifted off the counter. You feel the pitcher begin to tilt into a glass. You attempt to swim, but the current is too strong to fight, and you are drug directly into the glass. Who poured the glass?
15521.title: Someone enters the room.

155211.content: You are swirled around the glass and attempt to get your bearing. You figure out which way is up so you frantically fight for the surface. You take a quick breath of air and look up to see the glass tilting towards Christina's mouth. You feel the tea drawn towards the tiny hole into her mouth. Before long you can't fight the current and are sucked right between her lips. You try to grab hold of something, but the torrents of tea make it impossible. You come to a halt on Christina's tongue for a short moment before her tongue lifts up making you slide into her throat. Her throat muscles grab you at the waist and begin to draw you in. You try and fight the dragging forces, but they are much more powerful than you. You are pounded deeper and deeper into Christina's body. Before long you land with a slop in her stomach.
155211.title: Christina
